iati-activity.title: Arab Partnership Economic Facility (APEF) - Country Impact Fund (CIF)
iati-activity.description: To support inclusive and sustainable economic growth in the Middle East and North Africa region by supporting a range of local projects to strengthen workplace skills to increase employability for up to 2,000 people; create up to 1,500 jobs through support to enterprise innovation; strengthen the economic and social evidence base to inform national policy debate; support economic governance reforms; and to support 10 knowledge sharing events between NGOs and policy makers
